DzDockWindow Class Reference
[Interface Components]

Base class of windows that can be docked in a DzDockArea. More...

#include <dzdockwindow.h>

Detailed Description

Base class of windows that can be docked in a DzDockArea.

Re-Docks this window in the last area it was docked in.

Emitted when this window is docked.

DzDockArea * DzDockWindow::getArea (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The area that the window is currently docked in, or the last area it was docked in if it is undocked.
int DzDockWindow::getLength (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The actual length for this window while docked.
int DzDockWindow::getMinimumLength (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The minimum length for this window (if it is not minimized) while docked.
QWidget * DzDockWindow::getWidget (  )  const
Returns:
The main widget of this window.
bool DzDockWindow::isDocked (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if the this window is currently docked.
bool DzDockWindow::isLengthFixed (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if the value returned by length() is the only valid length for this window currently.
bool DzDockWindow::isMinimized (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if the this window is currently minimized.

Emitted when the value returned by length() has changed.

void DzDockWindow::normalize (  )  [protected]

'Normalizes' the preferred length for the window by setting it the window's current length.

Qt::Orientation DzDockWindow::orientation (  )  const
Returns:
The current orientation of this window.
void DzDockWindow::restore (  )  [virtual, slot]

Returns this window to its former length if it is minimized.

Reimplemented in DzPaneGroup.

Sets the preferred length for this window while docked.

Parameters:
The new preferred length for the window.
void DzDockWindow::setPrev ( DzDockWindow *  win  )  [protected]

Called by the framework to set the pointer to the previous window in the dock column.

Parameters:
win A pointer to the window that preceeds this window in the dock area column.
void DzDockWindow::setWidget ( QWidget *  widget  ) 

Set the main widget of this window.

Parameters:
widget The main widget for the dock window. This should already be a child of the window, This function just ensures that the widget is laid out properly.
void DzDockWindow::toggleDock (  )  [slot]

Toggles this window between its docked and undocked state. Calls dock() if this window is undocked, or undock() if it is docked.

void DzDockWindow::toggleMinimized (  )  [slot]

Toggles this window between the minimized and restored state.

void DzDockWindow::undock (  )  [virtual, slot]

Undocks this window.

DzDockWindow::undocked (  )  [signal]

Emitted when this window is undocked.
